mapper.select: select nickname "nick",TRANSACTION_PRICE "price", to_char(APPLICATION_DATE,'yy-mm-dd') AS "date",To_char(APPLICATION_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') "time",TRANSACTION_STATE "transactionState", BASE_ADDRESS "baseAddress", DETAIL_ADDRESS "detailAddress" from store_request_view WHERE TRANSACTION_STATE = '결제전' OR TRANSACTION_STATE = '승인대기중' AND user_id = #{userId} order by APPLICATION_DATE asc
